Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 3/3/1988 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 4/13/1991 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/9/1991, off Frank Viola (STL)...
Injured on 10/1/1991 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with San Diego in 1991...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/1992, off Scott Erickson (CIN)...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/1992, hitting .417 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1992, hitting .301 with 16 HR, 78 RBI...
